name: Station
description: Extending a station model to add review stats property

fields.name: review
fields.description: Review of a station

fields.name: id
fields.description: Unique ID of a station

fields.name: country_code
fields.description: ISO-3166 alpha-2 country code of a station

fields.name: party_id
fields.description: CPO ID of a CPO that 'owns' this station (following the ISO-15118 standard)

fields.name: publish
fields.description:
Defines if a Location may be published on an website or app etc.
When this is set to false, only tokens identified in the field: publish_allowed_to are allowed to show this Location.
When the same location has EVSEs that may be published and may not be published, two 'Locations' should be created.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Name of a charging station

fields.name: address
fields.description: Street/block name and house number if available

fields.name: city
fields.description: City or town

fields.name: postal_code
fields.description: Postal code of a location, may only be omitted when a location has no postal code: in some countries charging locations at highways donâ€™t have postal codes.

fields.name: state
fields.description: State or province of a location, only to be used when relevant

fields.name: country
fields.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code for the country of this station

fields.name: coordinates
fields.description: Coordinates of a location

fields.name: related_locations
fields.description: Geographical location of related points relevant to a user

fields.name: parking_type
fields.description: Type of parking at a charge point location

fields.name: evses
fields.description: EVSEs that belong to a station

fields.name: directions
fields.description: Human-readable directions on how to reach a station

fields.name: operator
fields.description: Information about an operator

fields.name: suboperator
fields.description: Information about a suboperator if applicable

fields.name: owner
fields.description: Information about an owner if available

fields.name: facilities
fields.description: Facilities a charging station belongs to

fields.name: time_zone
fields.description: Value from the IANA time zone database representing the time zone of a location. Examples: "Europe/Oslo", "Europe/Zurich". (http://www.iana.org/time-zones)

fields.name: opening_times
fields.description: Times when an EVSEs at a location can be accessed for charging

fields.name: charging_when_closed
fields.description: Indicates if the EVSEs are still charging outside the opening hours. E.g. when a parking garage closes its barriers over night, is it allowed to charge till the next morning? Default: true

fields.name: images
fields.description: Links to images related to a location such as photos or logos

fields.name: energy_mix
fields.description: Details of the energy supplied at a location

fields.name: last_updated
fields.description: Timestamp when a location, or one of its EVSEs or Connectors were last updated (or created)

fields.name: external_id
fields.description: ID provided by a station data source

fields.name: location
fields.description: GeoJSON location of a charging station

fields.name: elevation
fields.description: Elevation (altitude) level

fields.name: chargers
fields.description: Groups of EVSEs by power and type

fields.name: amenities
fields.description: Amenties located at this location

fields.name: physical_address
fields.description: Enriched information about the physical address of a station

fields.name: properties
fields.description: Optional object where you can store custom data you need in your application. This extends the current functionalities we offer

fields.name: realtime
fields.description: A flag which indicates if a station has realtime information about the availability of its connectors

fields.name: private
fields.description: A flag which indicates if a station is on a private property

fields.name: power
fields.description: Connectors grouped by power

fields.name: predictive_availability
fields.description: Station availability

fields.name: speed
fields.description: Charging speed for a station

fields.name: status
fields.description: Global status for a station
